title: Dominate Dominion—The Final Battle Tournament Registration Now Open!

embed.description: 1st Place: Prizes 1600 Riot Points Each Triumphant Ryze 5 MOBAFire T-Shirts 5 MOBAFire Stickers 4 Win IP Boost 2nd Place: Prizes 1200 Riot Points Each 5 MOBAFire Hats 4 Win IP Boost 3rd Place: Prizes 800 Riot Points Each 5 MOBAFire Stickers 4 Win IP Boost 4th Place: Prizes 400 Riot Points Each 4 Win IP Boost

body:
With Riot releasing the recent news stating they will be removing Dominion, I thought it was only fitting to bring Dominate Dominion back one last time! We are going way back to our roots and bringing back our original casters, the one and only [William Chobra](http://www.twitter.com/willchobra) and [Gandair](http://www.twitter.com/vatoclan)! 

**Server:** North America

**Time:** Saturday Feb. 20th at 5 PM Central.

**Bracket Size:** 32 Teams

[**Rules**](http://www.mobafire.com/league-of-legends/tournament/dominate-dominion-the-final-battle-170#rules)

[**Registration**](http://www.mobafire.com/league-of-legends/tournament/dominate-dominion-the-final-battle-170)

**[Twitch Stream](http://www.twitch.tv/dominategamingtv)**

**Prizing**

**First Place**

* 1600 Riot Points Each 
* **Triumphant** Ryze
* 5 MOBAFire T-Shirts
* 5 MOBAFire Stickers 
* 4 Win IP Boost

**Second Place**

* 1200 Riot Points Each
* 5 MOBAFire Hats
* 4 Win IP Boost

**Third Place**

* 800 Riot Points Each
* 5 MOBAFire Stickers
* 4 Win IP Boost

**Fourth Place**

* 400 Riot Points Each
* 4 Win IP Boost
 

This tournament **does** require a full team, but if you're actively looking, I'd suggest joining the League of Legends in game chat room **"DominateDominion"** on the NA server.

replies.body: To people say that Riot never cared about Dominion, they care enough to advertise a final tournament dedicated to it.
The obvious counter-argument is that perhaps if Riot had done things like this in the past, these might not have been the final Dominion tournaments.
Sadly, this is true. They use to do lots of tournaments in Season 3 (where I began).

right? imagine if they had advertised any of the many others hosted by Feedski in the past few years. maybe even been nice enough to host the stream on the official LoL twitch if nothing else was being broadcast at the time.
It's not a Red post though.
I said they advertised it by pinning it to the top of the boards.
Well just because it's a sort-of a bigger event than regular tournaments.
Looking forward to watching this. GW Feedski.

> [{quoted}](name=L4T3NCY,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=9y9yZgE4,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-02-18T03:45:44.889+0000)
>
> Looking forward to watching this. GW Feedski.

The last cries of an unwanted child finding out that they're not in the will, huh?  Sorry sir, but I'll believe Riot's sympathies towards Dom players in another lifetime.
Hey, come on, don't be mean.  It's not like individual Rioters can't be sympathetic.  Plus, L4T3NCY said he's going to be watching, so he's at least legitimately interested.

> [{quoted}](name=Spitemaster,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=9y9yZgE4,comment-id=000800010000,timestamp=2016-02-18T05:06:03.747+0000)
>
> Hey, come on, don't be mean.  It's not like individual Rioters can't be sympathetic.  Plus, L4T3NCY said he's going to be watching, so he's at least legitimately interested.

Turned out he didn't watch, unless he has a hidden account on Twitch. :/

> [{quoted}](name=TerraRising,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=9y9yZgE4,comment-id=0008000100000001,timestamp=2016-02-22T06:34:37.939+0000)
>
> Turned out he didn't watch, unless he has a hidden account on Twitch. :/

This is borderline stalker. Not sure how you can see every person who watched, but your comment is creepy.

> [{quoted}](name=SunLillie,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=9y9yZgE4,comment-id=00080001000000010000,timestamp=2016-02-22T15:26:09.964+0000)
>
> This is borderline stalker. Not sure how you can see every person who watched, but your comment is creepy.

Your accusation is borderline slander. 

 Twitch has a viewer list with the name of every viewer in the chat room.

> [{quoted}](name=TerraRising,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=9y9yZgE4,comment-id=000800010000000100000000,timestamp=2016-02-22T15:59:17.499+0000)
>
> Your accusation is borderline slander. 
> 
>  Twitch has a viewer list with the name of every viewer in the chat room.

But it would be their screen names not their personal name, correct? How do you know all of his screen names? That is what I meant. I understand you are upset. I found Dominion too late, but I enjoyed it more than any other game mode Riot offers. I hope they will make another mode similar to Dominion's playstyle.

L4T3NCY has always expressed a love for dominion... one rioter =/= all of riot. If you want a better idea of how dominion would have panned out had Riot invested all their resources into, I suggest you check out a game called Infinite Crisis. It was pretty much dominion refined into its own Moba. It's dead now, barely ever made a blip in the gaming scene
Infinite Crisis.. there was some fun stuff in that game. <3
It'd be nice if we could have more you know, maybe if you keep Dominion and update it.
I really want to play in this tournament.  I hope it doesn't fill up before I can look for a team tomorrow. :/
Knowing the Dominion players, you'll have plenty of time. If they are anything like they were the past 100 tournaments, they will register on the last day. :P

...to show dominance.


Where's the door? Ah, i see it.
Wrong door, that's the entrance. The exit is to your right.
It's pathetic how the only support this mode has ever gotten is when you're about to remove it from the game...
ManWolf

For those that don't know; Every time I read Moobeat's  PBE notes about Dominion, this guy's name almost surely popped up. Not sure if he was solo balancing Dominion for quite some time, but it sure looked that way. In terms of buffs and nerfs to champs, and some system adjustments such as the soul anchor trinket. ManWolf, you did your best for Dominion and that was greatly appreciated. Now we're seeing you move on to bigger things: {{champion:6}}

To clarify, Nome was the first guy in charge of alternate maps (TT/Dom/ARAM). ManWolfAxeBoss took over when Nome later moved over to work on gameplay clarity. Not sure who's taking over now though, since MWAB seems to be on the SR Balance team nowadays.
This is goin to be awesome!! I haven't watched a Dominion tournament yet. I didn't know they had Dominion tournaments. Wish I had started playing league a few years ago instead of months ago.

*Global sticky for Dominion.* This is new and also very nice.

In case anyone wants to attend but already has plans for Saturday, there's [one last Dominion tournament](http://www.reverieesports.com/tournaments-lol-dominion/) scheduled for Sunday, hosted by Reverie Esports. Better yet, come out for both of them!

Hope people have fun in this Final Dominion Competition.

**_HAVE FUN_**

Amputease is in the house.  :)

Expect our registration by tomorrow.
Please set up one on the EUW server as well!

And this EUW tourny is on Sunday, it has some of the better teams than the CA event, but it also doesn't allow for solo players to register, meaning you would need to find a team. Its somewhere in the listings of tournaments

http://tournois-legend.com/en/tournament/all

Alright so for EUW players, they have this one on Sat+Sun: https://battlefy.com/cerberus-assault/ca-dominion-showdown/568502ba2c447e4b0007ab1f/info

This one allows you to register as a solo player

Can't you make it a Friday or a Sunday?

Pretty please with a dead Teemo on top? XD
Sorry sir, I can't. BUT! There is another Dominion tournament Sunday, so make sure to check that out.
does anyone have space for me? I want to join the tournament but I don't have a team. :/
